actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that hypertension developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 2 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service-connected.

summary.text: Provides that hypertension developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within two years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service connected for purposes of veterans' benefits. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 312)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide that hypertension developing a 10 percent or more degree of disability within 2 years after separation from active service during a period of war shall be presumed to be service-connected.
